scripts.start: MAVEN_OPTS="--add-opens java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED" concurrently "cd B2XKlaim-BackEnd && mvn spring-boot:run" "cd B2XKlaim-FrontEnd && npm run serve"
scripts.start:windows: cross-env MAVEN_OPTS="--add-opens java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED" concurrently "cd B2XKlaim-BackEnd && mvn spring-boot:run" "cd B2XKlaim-FrontEnd && npm run serve"
